articles.title: Philippines, Jordan to host remaining FIBA Asia Cup 2021 Qualifiers' games - FIBA
articles.description: BEIRUT (Lebanon) - The FIBA Regional Office Asia has confirmed today the locations of the remaining FIBA Asia Cup 2021 Qualifiers' games that were postponed in February.
articles.content: BEIRUT (Lebanon) - The FIBA Regional Office Asia has confirmed today the locations of the remaining FIBA Asia Cup 2021 Qualifiers' games that were postponed in February due to restrictions imposed by… [+788 chars]

articles.title: For the rich, living in Asia is costlier than anywhere else - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: (April 9): If you’re wealthy, Asia Pacific is the most expensive place to live in, with Shanghai overtaking Hong Kong as the priciest city in the world.Those are some of the key findings from a Julius Baer Group Ltd. report about luxury lifestyles released Fr…

articles.author: Genevieve Sarah Loh
articles.title: Singapore's Chin Han on becoming Mortal Kombat's Shang Tsung - CNA
articles.description: Singapore’s only Hollywood blockbuster star talks to CNA Lifestyle about saying yes to an iconic role and being part of an authentically diverse Asian cast.

articles.title: 24-year-old actor in Myanmar arrested: 'The security forces came with 8 military trucks and about 50 soldiers' - AsiaOne
articles.description: Myanmar security forces on Thursday (April 8) arrested Paing Takhon, a model and actor who had spoken out against the coup, his sister told Reuters, as activists placed shoes filled with flowers in parts of Yangon to commemorate dead protesters. Troops opened…
